title: Mixing and Mastering Services
subtitle: Immersive. Clean. Clear. This is my thesis for Mixing and Mastering.
html:
My aim is to talk to the artist at length about their art and the message they are trying to communicate. All decisions are informed based on the artists intent and rendering a world where that intent is clear.

My Work:

I had the honor and absolute please working with John on his release Hope Miraculous.
keywords: audio engineering, mixing, mastering, audio mixing, audio mastering, music studio, electronic music
